titleInfo.title: ‘OUTLINE PLAN of the WORKS CONNECTED WITH THE DEFENCE of the MAIN PASS at ADEN’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on tracing paper with additions in pencilDimensions:701 x 1032 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by contours.Outline plan showing Main Pass and Military Road with proposed fortifications including batteries, guard room and bridge across Main Pass with gateway. Landmarks lettered for reference with a key provided at the lower left-hand corner of sheet which include a note: ‘Suspended by order of the Govr. Genl. T. The plan shews the proposed method of finishing these works. The details will be shewn in enlarged plans to accompany this’.Inscriptions:On recto, bottom left-hand corner:‘Copied in the Chief Engrs. Office Bombay 26th September 1846’. And above: ‘146’.On recto, bottom right-hand corner: ‘(Signed) of Kilner Captain Ex.ve Eng.r Aden’.On verso, bottom left-hand corner with bleed-through into the recto:‘In Bombay Secret Letter No. 113 of 1846 Recd. via Southampton 10th Novr. 1846 Aden Fortifications’.
